medical_history.chief_complaint: Tenderness in the right lower quadrant (RLQ) with a palpable mass.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 5 days prior to presentation with a tender RLQ mass. Additionally, there is a history of constipation and fecal impaction, but the patient had several bowel movements including the morning of the examination.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Dementia (advanced), Chronic Atrial Fibrillation, Right hemiplegia (post-CVA), Urinary incontinence, Osteoporosis, Spinal kyphosis, Glaucoma, Constipation, Hyperlipidemia (HLD), Hypertension (HTN), Osteoarthritis, Chronic Kidney Disease (CKD), Vitamin B deficiency.
